name: Fédération Européenne des Recycleurs de Verre
memberOrga: FERVER represents roughly 70% of the collection capacity of glass waste in Europe. FERVER tells 45 members in 20 Countries (including 5 non-EU Members: Macedonia, Norway, Russia, Turkey and Ukraine). The updated list of members is available on www.ferver.eu
goal:
FERVER informs its members of all relevant developments and promotes their activities to the wider public and to the European institutions and organisations.
FERVER contributes to the transformation of our wasteful society into one of sustainable resource management.
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Food Safety
euInitiatives:
Active participation in the setting of criteria for the Regulation 1179/2012 on end of waste glass.
Following with a particular attention the positions of the Parliamrnt and of the Council on the Commission legal proposal 'circular economy', particularly the revision of the following Directives (&) The waste directive 2008/98, (2) the packaging & packaging waste directive 94/62, (3) the en-of-live vehicles directive 2000/53 and (4) the landfill directive 1999/31
